column5: i will be fishing sioux narrows area lotw in a couple weeks.considering a portable gps unit for the trip as we would like to do some exploring in a safe manner. can someone suggest a unit for around 250-300$ that is user friendly and can accomodate a chip that would correspond with the Hot Spots map for the SE section of lotw.any other info about using one of these units would be very helpful as well.please list brand,model,price, and how you feel its ease of use is.18 days til wally time!!!jig ouuut!
